originalText.text: Victor is a stand-up guy who does great work. He was able to help me beat my ticket and kept me well informed and calm the entire time. It was an excellent experience and I would happily use him again in the future (hopefully I wont have to). Worth every penny!

originalText.text: I met Victor 15yrs ago at the Fordham rd. Court House. He has the nicest personality. He has won numerous cases for me and many others. He knows the Court system and he professionally knows his stuff. I guarantee he will get you the best results !!! He is the best  !!!! ðŸ˜Š

originalText.text:
Mr. Bernace proved to be exceptionally helpful and professional, addressing all my inquiries about a ticket from November 2022. Unlike other lawyers, he displayed remarkable honesty by providing accurate information, including informing me that the case had been dismissed, without charging me. I am grateful for his integrity and would wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone in need. If I require legal services in the future, Mr. Bernace would unquestionably be my choice for representation.
Thank you again Mr. Bernace

originalText.text:
How can I ask for a better lawyer, received a traffic ticket back in August 2021. I search and search for the best lawyer and came across Victor. From the moment we spoke about the possibilities about getting my traffic ticket dismissed, Victor was completely honest about what might can happen but he will do his BEST, unlike other lawyers where they just tell you what you like to hear and pay double the amount just to feel uncertain.
Victor kept me updated for 2 years! And now August 2023 I just received the best news ever, MY TICKET WAS DISMISSED !!!
This is not a fake review or nothing, Victor is ON TOP OF HIS GAME!
I know I have someone to trust if I ever get into a bundle with the NYPD ðŸ˜‚
Victor, I canâ€™t thank you enough. All I know is that Iâ€™m buying you wine. ðŸ˜‚

originalText.text: Couldn't have picked a better lawyer, Victor is top-notch even though my traffic case didn't go as planned last month. Waiting for the hearing was tough but his expert guidance was there every step of the way. He's definitely your guy if you need a traffic lawyer. His handling of traffic violations is simply exceptional. Highly recommended!
